name: Roguemaniac
description:
You are a peaceful explorer that is exploring the undergorund, full of monsters! Try to survive down there! But don't forget to eat - keep that in mind. Because you are that peacful you wouldn't hurt a single soul. So find a way to get rid of the monsters!

This game is currently not even in Alpha status, so don't expect a lot from it. More features will be added soon! I would love to hear what you think about this game, so let me know in the comment section!
